name: Luna (itch) (Nhoj Plummer)
description:
Luna

A simple platformer project made by two people as a way to test skills within the field of gaming for college. It was the first ever game I've made (Me as Nhoj/Jinxy) and with help from my senior (Chiaki Hashizume).

Note

If anyone has any tips on how to improve my skills in designing, drawing, programming, sound editing, or any other skills related to building games please don't be afraid to comment and contact me!
   

Credits       
        Chiaki Hashizume
            - Lead Artist
            - Asset Production

            - Sound Designer
